title: UTF-8 Number Forms

metadata.description: Learn about UTF-8 Number Forms with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Hex 2150-218B / Decimal 8528-8587 If you want any of these characters displayed in HTML, you can use the HTML entity found in the table below. If the character does not have an HTML entity, you can use the decimal (dec) or hexadecimal (hex) reference. Example

I will display Ⅵ

I will display Ⅵ

Will display as: I will display Ⅵ I will display Ⅵ Char Dec Hex Entity Name ⅐ 8528 2150 VULGAR FRACTION ONE SEVENTH ⅑ 8529 2151 VULGAR FRACTION ONE NINTH ⅒ 8530 2152 VULGAR FRACTION ONE TENTH ⅓ 8531 2153 ⅓ VULGAR FRACTION ONE THIRD ⅔ 8532 2154 ⅔ VULGAR FRACTION TWO THIRDS ⅕ 8533 2155 ⅕ VULGAR FRACTION ONE FIFTH ⅖ 8534 2156 ⅖ VULGAR FRACTION TWO FIFTHS ⅗ 8535 2157 ⅗ VULGAR FRACTION THREE FIFTHS ⅘ 8536 2158 ⅘ VULGAR FRACTION FOUR FIFTHS ⅙ 8537 2159 ⅙ VULGAR FRACTION ONE SIXTH ⅚ 8538 215A ⅚ VULGAR FRACTION FIVE SIXTHS ⅛ 8539 215B ⅛ VULGAR FRACTION ONE EIGHTH ⅜ 8540 215C ⅜ VULGAR FRACTION THREE EIGHTHS ⅝ 8541 215D ⅝ VULGAR FRACTION FIVE EIGHTHS ⅞ 8542 215E ⅞ VULGAR FRACTION SEVEN EIGHTHS ⅟ 8543 215F FRACTION NUMERATOR ONE Ⅰ 8544 2160 ROMAN NUMERAL ONE Ⅱ 8545 2161 ROMAN NUMERAL TWO Ⅲ 8546 2162 ROMAN NUMERAL THREE Ⅳ 8547 2163 ROMAN NUMERAL FOUR Ⅴ 8548 2164 ROMAN NUMERAL FIVE Ⅵ 8549 2165 ROMAN NUMERAL SIX Ⅶ 8550 2166 ROMAN NUMERAL SEVEN Ⅷ 8551 2167 ROMAN NUMERAL EIGHT Ⅸ 8552 2168 ROMAN NUMERAL FOUR ⅴ 8564 2174 SMALL ROMAN NUMERAL FIVE ⅵ 8565 2175 SMALL ROMAN NUMERAL SIX ⅶ 8566 2176 SMALL ROMAN NUMERAL SEVEN ⅷ 8567 2177 SMALL ROMAN NUMERAL EIGHT ⅸ 8568 2178 SMALL ROMAN NUMERAL NINE ⅹ summary: This tutorial covers UTF-8 Number Forms concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use UTF-8 Number Forms effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of UTF-8 Number Forms and how to apply it in your projects.
